hero.title: Advertise globally. Sell more properties.
hero.description: Maximise your success by advertising your properties to a world of international buyers. Generate enquiries that result in sales. Your listings can be live in as little as 1 hour.

buyers.description: Your properties viewed by up to 3 million international buyers a month.
buyers.title: 3 million buyers

enquiries.description: Over {{enquiries}} quality enquiries delivered to agents like you each month.
enquiries.title: {{enquiries}} enquiries

languages.description: Market your properties in 13 languages across {{countries}} countries.
languages.title: 13 languages

live_listings.description: Listings live in as little as 1 hour through our industry standard XML feed.
live_listings.title: 1 hour to go live

hero.description:
Welcome to Kyero!
We want to help you succeed by advertising your properties to a world of international buyers.
hero.title: Access to millions of international buyers

international_audience.description: Over the last 12 months, millions of buyers around the world have visited Kyero.com.
international_audience.title: Get access to our international buyer audience

listings_exposure.international_buyers: Millions of international buyers viewing your properties
listings_exposure.mailing: Our multiple email, media, & PR campaigns are seen by hundreds of thousands of buyers each month
listings_exposure.prime_boost: Prime Boost allows you to secure the top 3 spots in your chosen location
listings_exposure.prime_listings: Prime listings appear at the top of search results
listings_exposure.publications: Regular features of Kyero properties in national publications
listings_exposure.social_media: Opportunity to reach additional buyers through Kyero Social Media channels
listings_exposure.title: Increase exposure of your listings

advantages.b_corp: We’re in business to do good and are a certified B Corp.
advantages.established_in: Established in 2003, we’ve helped over 50,000 people find their sunshine with confidence in Spain, Portugal, France and Italy.
advantages.fast_and_easy: Fast and easy set up with industry standard xml feeds. Your properties live within an hour and automatically updated daily.
advantages.guides_and_advice: Extensive guides and advice to remove buyer uncertainty. More informed buyers resulting in higher quality leads.
advantages.international_team: International multilingual sales team; who know the market and speak your language.
advantages.languages: Translation for buyers across 13 different languages.
advantages.prime_portal: Kyero is the Prime portal for leads from international buyers.

contact.description: Get a personal intro to Kyero from one of our team - enter some details and we’ll be in touch with more info.

agent_branding.subtitle: Every Prime listing is branded with your logo.
agent_branding.title: Agent Branding

agent_directory.subtitle: Prime agents are always displayed before free agents.

bigger_photos.subtitle: Prime listings are more visually appealing and attract more clicks.
bigger_photos.title: Bigger photos

daily_imports.subtitle: Only Prime agent’s properties update daily (rather than weekly).
daily_imports.title: Daily Imports

email_alerts.subtitle: Only new Prime listings are automatically emailed to buyers.
email_alerts.title: Email alerts

enhanced_analytics.subtitle: Prime agents can access more detailed market and performance analysis.
enhanced_analytics.title: Enhanced analytics

floorplans.subtitle: Only Prime listings can display a floorplan link.

full_export.subtitle: Only Prime agents can export their full, translated listings from Kyero.

media_visibility.subtitle: Only Prime properties are eligible for social media & PR advertising.
media_visibility.title: Extra media visibility

priority_results.subtitle: Prime listings are always displayed before free listings.
priority_results.title: Priority results

property_videos.subtitle: Only Prime listings can display a video link.
property_videos.title: Property Videos

recommended_properties.subtitle: Prime listings are always recommended before free listings.
recommended_properties.title: Recommended Properties

remote_viewing.subtitle: Only Prime listings display a remote viewing option.
remote_viewing.title: Remote viewing

virtual_tours.subtitle: Only Prime listings can display a virtual tour link.
virtual_tours.title: Virtual Tours

hero.description: Give your listings priority exposure to qualified buyers. Kyero Prime dramatically increases the number of enquiries you receive. It’s a turbo-boost for your property marketing.
hero.title: The Kyero Prime Advantage

cta.subtitle: We integrate with all the major property management systems, so it’s easy to keep listings in sync.
cta.title: Automatically add and update property listings with integrations

footer.description: Kyero are here to help you find your sunshine, by helping you navigate your entire journey, giving you the inspiration, information and tools that put you in control.

for_agents.description: Find out how Kyero can help you sell more properties
for_agents.title: For agents

success.first_email: Look out for your first email this coming Sunday!
success.weekly_email: Every Sunday you'll get a regular weekly email with the latest properties we think you'll love.

newsletter.title: Keep on top of your market. Get the latest insights in your inbox

agent_portal.description: Optimise listings, get enquiry insights that tell you how likely someone is to buy, and access the reports you need to be the best.
agent_portal.title: Full access to the Agent Portal

integration.description: Already using a property management tool? No problem - Kyero seamlessly integrates 80+ systems so you don’t have to change a thing.
integration.title: Full integration with your existing systems

prime_boost.description: Get your properties in front of more buyers with Prime Boost. Choose where to promote and how long for, and watch the enquiries roll in.
prime_boost.title: Prime Boost: extra pushes for important properties

kyero_prime.contact: Don't see a pack that suits your portfolio or budget? We have more options, contact us now to tell us what you need.
kyero_prime.description: Kyero Prime helps agencies of all sizes sell properties quicker and easier than ever before.
kyero_prime.title: Get started with Kyero Prime today

country_neutral.description: Kyero.com gives you access to millions of international buyers. We are trusted by over 10,000 agents across Spain, France, Portugal and Italy.
country_neutral.title: Sell more property

success.email_message: Once we’re done, one of our team will send a welcome email to {{email}} with instructions on how to get started.
success.message: Thanks for signing up to Kyero, {{name}}! We’ll check your business details and make sure everything’s correct. This can take up to two days.
success.title: Let’s get your properties in front of millions of global buyers

bar.title: Kyero uses cookies to give you a better experience

cookie.cookie_policy: Read more in the cookie policy

essential_cookies.message: These are our own cookies that are required for the operation of Kyero.com. Without them we can’t operate properly, for example, a cookie enables you to log in or to remember your searches.
essential_cookies.title: Essential cookies

non_essential.message: These non-essential cookies help us to analyse how you found us and how you use Kyero.com. This helps us to continuously improve.
non_essential.title: Non-essential cookies
